title: InfoJobs Scraper
description: Scrape job listings from InfoJobs.net. Provide keyword/location or a specific search URL. The actor handles pagination and optional detail scraping.

startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: List of InfoJobs search URLs. If provided, overrides keyword/location.

keyword.title: Keyword
keyword.description: Job search keyword(s), e.g., "Software Developer", "Marketing Manager".

location.title: Location (province IDs)
location.description: Province ID(s) for filtering (e.g., "28" for Madrid). Leave empty for all locations.

collectDetails.title: Collect job details
collectDetails.description: If enabled, fetches job detail pages/descriptions.

results_wanted.title: Maximum number of jobs
results_wanted.description: Maximum jobs to collect. Leave empty to collect all available within page cap.

max_pages.title: Maximum number of pages
max_pages.description: Safety cap on paginated requests (applies to API and HTML).

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Use Apify Proxy for reliable scraping.

dedupe.title: Deduplicate results
dedupe.description: Remove duplicate job URLs from results (in-memory).
